title: Curry Chicken
description: This is a recipe for curry chicken.
instructions: Rinse the chicken under water and pat it dry.

In a large ziplock bag, combine the chicken with half of the scallions, half of the onion, 2 tablespoons of curry powder, 1 tablespoon of oil, half of the thyme, bouillon, ginger, allspice, black pepper, salt, garlic, and Scotch bonnet.
Make sure the chicken is evenly coated.
Seal the bag and refrigerate for up to 4 hours, preferably overnight.
The next day, heat the remaining oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat.
Add the remaining curry powder to the saucepan and cook for about 1 minute until fragrant.
Add the chicken to the saucepan, cover it, and cook for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the remaining scallions, remaining onion, remaining thyme, potato, and 2 cups (473 ml) of water to the saucepan.
Bring the mixture to a boil.
Reduce the heat to maintain a simmer and cook, uncovered, for 20 to 25 minutes until the potatoes are tender and the sauce thickens.
Serve the dish with rice or roti.

ingredients.name: black pepper
ingredients.notes: freshly ground, plus more to taste
